title: URBAN CHINA — Sourcing & Delivery from China
service_1_desc: Our team will find the right product in China according to your requirements, negotiate with suppliers, and offer you the best options.
service_2_desc: Official cargo delivery from China worldwide — including Russia, CIS countries, Europe, and the USA. We arrange legal "white" imports with full customs clearance, cargo insurance, and delivery directly to your warehouse — both in Moscow and other regions.
service_3_desc: We organize the best tours across China tailored to all your preferences: trade fairs, leisure, factory visits, and other interests.
service_4_desc: We fully prepare your goods for marketplaces: custom labels, barcodes, and optimal packaging solutions.
service_5_title: Company Registration in China & Hong Kong
service_5_desc: We handle full company setup in China and Hong Kong, including documentation and bank account opening assistance.
service_6_desc: We produce goods under your brand. Your logo will be applied to products sourced in China to boost recognition and uniqueness.
advantages_summary: Own warehouses, fast order processing, fully legal operations, a large network of verified suppliers, and transparent service.
advantage_1_desc: We respond promptly and help solve your tasks efficiently.
advantage_2_desc: We operate officially and follow all regulations.
advantage_3_desc: We have an extensive database of trusted factories and suppliers for your convenience.
faq_a1: We operate officially and transparently. All details — from sourcing to delivery — are listed on the “Terms” page.
faq_q2: What is the minimum order value?
faq_a2: For test samples — from $500. For official “white” import — from 1,000,000 RUB.
faq_q3: What’s needed for a custom order?
faq_a3: Just send us specifications, photos, or a video. Our Chinese-speaking specialists will contact the factory and arrange the order.
faq_q4: Do you source products for marketplaces?
faq_a4: We don’t analyze niches, but we can find and purchase any product in China — via your link or technical brief.
faq_a5: Yes. We check factory licenses and documents. Our experts know how authentic Chinese certificates look, minimizing fraud risks.
conditions_1_text:
Platforms: 1688, Taobao, Yiwugo, Pinduoduo, Poizon, and others.

Minimum order: $1,000, 20–25 SKUs, weight ≥15 kg.

You can search for products yourself. Need help? Message us on Telegram or WhatsApp — we’ll assist with sourcing, samples, and photo/video reviews.

Our commission:
• 5% — for clients spending $10,000+/month
• 7% — for orders from $5,000 to $10,000
• 10% — for new clients (< $5,000)

At our China warehouse:
• Consolidation
• Stock & quality inspection
• Photo/video report
• Secure packaging & labeling
• Basic QC — 10% of batch. Detailed QC — upon request (paid separately).
conditions_2_text:
We handle:
• Consolidation at our warehouse
• Professional packaging
• Customs clearance
• Delivery from China to Moscow
• Shipping across Russia and CIS

Cargo transits through Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, or Belarus. Delivery is legal — you’ll receive only a transport waybill.

“White” (fully documented) shipping is available for orders from $5,000.
conditions_3_text:
When to pay: after cargo arrives in Moscow.

Payment methods:
• In Russia: cash (USD/RUB), Sberbank, Tinkoff
• In China: WeChat, Alipay (in CNY)
• Also accepted: USDT

Insurance (mandatory, covers only loss):
• ≤ $50/kg → 1%
• $50–$100/kg → 2%
• $100–$200/kg → 3%
• $200–$300/kg → 5%

Example: if 1 kg costs $120 — insurance = 3% of total order value.
